name: Dastroid
description:
Submission for DJam2.

Controls - 

forward - W
rotate - A/D
brake - S

you can collide with asteroids, just so long as they are not moving too fast relative to you. Same applies to fragments, but you collect the fragments instead for currency

you can spend currency on more ammo/fuel

the goal of the game is to collect all 3 powerups
